item.title: I’m Convinced These Are The 10 Most Underrated Joker Movie & Show Appearances In His Entire 58-Year-Long History
item.description: The Joker has appeared in countless movies and shows over the years, but these are easily the most underrated interpretations of the DC villain.

item.title: "I've Been Doing Stunts The Past Couple Of Days:" Avengers: Doomsday's Nightcrawler Alan Cumming Teases Action-Packed X-Men Scenes
item.description: Nightcrawler actor Alan Cumming shares an update from the set of Avengers: Doomsday, where he's pulling off his own action stunts at sixty years old.

item.title: Doctor Doom Takes Over From Iron Man To Become Avengers: Doomsday’s Villain According To MCU Theory
item.description: Many people point to Infamous Iron Man as a comic book precedent for RDJ playing Doctor Doom – and a new theory makes this way more likely.

item.title: Hollywood Stars Celebrate Mother's Day
item.description: It's Mother's Day, and if one group of people that know how to give it up for their Mama Bears -- it's Hollywood's rich and famous. Some of the bigges...

item.title: Diddy Courthouse Gets Fresh Paint As Global Attention Mounts Amid Trial
